about_the_game:
You are a Keeper of the Enchanted Books who enters the world of books. Traverse arcane dungeons, purge them of monsters, and leap into the well to plunge even deeper into hidden depths bound by forgotten spells.

Build your own magic gun with found scrolls

Combine scrolls found in the books to create your own magic gun as you descend deeper into the well. Create a single, devastating projectile unleashing immense destruction in a single strike or trigger a chain of projectiles one after another.

Play. Improve. Repeat.

Every run is an exclusive experience. Unlock new scrolls and discover powerful combinations and synergies that best suit your playstyle.

Main features

  • Create your own magic gun using powerful spell combinations

  • Procedurally generated levels provide an unique experience every time

  • Lots of scrolls and items to unlock

  • Easy-to-learn combat system

short_description: Plunge into the world of books and build your own magic gun with found scrolls. In this roguelike dungeon crawler you will fiddle with synergies to create one gun that will allow you to purge the books of monsters.
